attributes.action: review the case for asylum of Al Bangura
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Al Bangura was granted asylum in the UK at the age of 15 as his father had been killed by the secret society he belonged to and tradition dictates that a fathers sons are also killed.He has become a succesful footballer playing for Watford FC (19 times in the premiership) and is in a stable relationship,recently becoming a father.

rejection.details: Individual cases are a matter for direct correspondence with the Home Office.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
